dcterms:creator: Kevin Lybarger
Mari Ostendorf
Meliha Yetisgen
dcterms:description: A dataset of electronic health record notes annotated for social determinants of health (SDoH) that provided a basis for the recent n2c2/UW SDoH Challenge. The notes are from two different sources: clinical notes of chronic pain patients from the University of Washington Medical Center and discharge notes of intensive care unit patients from MIMIC-III.
dcterms:title: SHAC

dcterms:creator: Bertie Vidgen
Tristan Thrush
Zeerak Waseem
Douwe Kiela
dcterms:description: A dynamically generated dataset for hate speech detection, created through four rounds of data creation, resulting in a total of around 40,000 entries with a positive rate of 45%.
dcterms:title: Hate Speech Detection (DynGEN set)

dcterms:creator: Ona de Gibert

dcterms:description: A dataset collected from a real-world white supremacist forum published between 2002 and 2017, containing posts labeled for hate speech.
dcterms:title: Hate Speech Detection (WSF set)

dcterms:description: A freely accessible critical care database containing de-identified health data associated with patients admitted to critical care units.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III
